if(NOT "${IREE_TARGET_BACKEND_DYLIB-LLVM-AOT}" OR
   NOT "${IREE_HAL_DRIVER_DYLIB_SYNC}")
  return()
endif()

iree_add_all_subdirs()

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    IR
  HDRS
    "conversion_patterns.h"
    "nod_dialect.h"
    "nod_ops.h.inc"
  SRCS
    "conversion_patterns.cc"
    "nod_dialect.cc"
    "nod_ops.cc.inc"
  DEPS
    ::nod_imports
    ::nod_ops_gen
    LLVMSupport
    MLIRIR
    MLIRParser
    MLIRPass
    MLIRSideEffectInterfaces
    MLIRTransforms
    iree::compiler::Dialect::HAL::Conversion
    iree::compiler::Dialect::HAL::IR
    iree::compiler::Dialect::Util::IR
    iree::compiler::Dialect::VM::Conversion
  PUBLIC
)

iree_tablegen_library(
  NAME
    nod_ops_gen
  TD_FILE
    "nod_ops.td"
  OUTS
    -gen-op-decls nod_ops.h.inc
    -gen-op-defs nod_ops.cc.inc
)

iree_c_embed_data(
  NAME
    nod_imports
  SRCS
    "nod.imports.mlir"
  C_FILE_OUTPUT
    "nod.imports.c"
  H_FILE_OUTPUT
    "nod.imports.h"
  IDENTIFIER
    "iree_nod_imports"
  FLATTEN
  PUBLIC
)

message(STATUS "MKL Directory: ${MKL_DIR}")
iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    module
  HDRS
    "module.h"
  SRCS
    "module.cc"
  INCLUDES
    ${MKL_DIR}/include
  DEPS
    iree::base
    iree::base::cc
    iree::hal
    iree::modules::hal
    iree::vm
    iree::vm::cc
  PUBLIC
)
target_link_directories(iree_compiler_Dialect_Nod_IR_module PUBLIC ${MKL_DIR}/lib/intel64)
target_link_libraries(iree_compiler_Dialect_Nod_IR_module PUBLIC mkl_intel_ilp64 mkl_gnu_thread mkl_core gomp)
